IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: Educate in order to advance the public's knowledge of and appreciation for the value of art as a source of beauty, inspiration, information and expression. To preserve, exhibit and promote visual art throughout Central Louisiana in a way that contributes to the quality of life.
IRS990.MissionDesc: Educate in order to advance the public's knowledge of and appreciation for the value of art as a source of beauty, inspiration, information and expression. To preserve, exhibit and promote visual art throughout Central Louisiana in a way that contributes to the quality of life.
IRS990.Desc: Exhibits and classes offered for educational purposes, public awareness, and advancement of the arts.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Part III, Line 4: Description of organization's collections and how it furthers its purpose.
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: Permanent art collection and additional donor gifts are held for exhibit, education, public awareness and advancement of the arts

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Part V, Line 4: Intended uses of the endowment fund.
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: Endowment funds are held to establish permanent funding for professorships, scholarhips, and other institutional purposes in accordance with donor restrictions.Endowments are held by Central Louisiana Community Foundation, an unrealated nonprofit foundation, in accordance with an agreement between the parties. These funds were established by donor contributions for the benefit of the Alexandria Musuem of Art, a wholly owned subsidiary of Louisiana State University at Alexandria Foundation, Inc.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Part XI, Line 2d: Other revenue amounts included in F/S but not included on form 990
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: Direct expenses on Part VIII Line 8B $72215

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Part XII, Line 2d: Other expenses and losses per audited F/S
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: Direct expenses on Part VIII Line 8b $72215

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 11b
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: The 990 will be reviewed by the Board, the Excecutive Director, the LSUA Foundation Board, the LSUA Foundation President and the LSUA Foundation Accountant

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 12c
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: Since all personnel of the organizaiton are direct employees of Louisiana State University at Alexandria, the University's polices govern the organization. COmpliance is monitored and enforced by the University in accordance with its policies

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, Line 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: The organization makes its governing documents, conflict of interest policy, and financial statements available to the public upon request
The organization did not change its audit oversight process or independent auditor selection process during the year.
